title: Future Value of Savings
formula_raw: Future Value of Savings = Present Value × (1 + r)^t

title: Required Monthly Savings
formula_raw: Required Monthly Savings = Target Amount ÷ Months Left

title: Time to Reach Goal
formula_raw: Time to Reach Goal = ln(FV ÷ PV) ÷ ln(1 + r)

title: Inflation Adjusted Savings
formula_raw: Inflation Adjusted Savings = Nominal Savings ÷ (1 + Inflation Rate)^t

title: Real Value of Money
formula_raw: Real Value of Money = Nominal Value ÷ CPI

title: Debt-to-Income Ratio
formula_raw: Debt-to-Income Ratio = (Monthly Debt Payments ÷ Monthly Income) × 100

title: Loan-to-Value Ratio (LTV)
formula_raw: Loan-to-Value Ratio (LTV) = Loan Amount ÷ Asset Value × 100

title: APR
formula_raw: APR = [(Total Interest + Fees) ÷ Loan Amount ÷ Years] × 100

title: Simple Loan Payoff Time
formula_raw: Simple Loan Payoff Time = Debt ÷ Monthly Payment

title: Amortization (nth payment interest)
formula_raw: Amortization (nth payment interest) = Remaining Principal × Rate ÷ 12

title: Snowball Payoff Order
formula_raw: Snowball Payoff Order = Smallest Debt → Largest

title: Avalanche Payoff Order
formula_raw: Avalanche Payoff Order = Highest Interest → Lowest

title: Debt Coverage Ratio
formula_raw: Debt Coverage Ratio = Net Income ÷ Total Debt Payment

title: Balloon Payment
formula_raw: Balloon Payment = Loan Principal − (EMI × Paid Installments)

title: ROI
formula_raw: ROI = (Final Value − Initial Value) ÷ Initial Value × 100

title: Dividend Yield
formula_raw: Dividend Yield = Annual Dividend ÷ Share Price × 100

title: Market Capitalization
formula_raw: Market Capitalization = Share Price × Shares Outstanding

title: Price-to-Book Ratio
formula_raw: Price-to-Book Ratio = Share Price ÷ (Assets − Liabilities per Share)

title: Sharpe Ratio
formula_raw: Sharpe Ratio = (Portfolio Return − Risk-Free Rate) ÷ Std Dev

title: Bond Yield
formula_raw: Bond Yield = Annual Coupon ÷ Bond Price × 100

title: Retirement Corpus
formula_raw: Retirement Corpus = Annual Expense × Retirement Years × (1+Inflation)^t

title: Future Value of Annuity
formula_raw: Future Value of Annuity = P × [(1+r)^n − 1] ÷ r

title: Present Value of Annuity
formula_raw: Present Value of Annuity = P × [1 − (1+r)^−n] ÷ r

title: Pension Value
formula_raw: Pension Value = Annual Pension ÷ Discount Rate

title: Required Retirement Savings
formula_raw: Required Retirement Savings = (Annual Expenses − Pension) × Years

title: Social Security Replacement Rate
formula_raw: Social Security Replacement Rate ≈ 40% × Final Salary

title: Insurance Coverage Ratio
formula_raw: Insurance Coverage Ratio = Insurance ÷ Annual Income

title: Human Life Value (HLV)
formula_raw: Human Life Value (HLV) = Annual Income × Years Left till Retirement

title: Sum Assured
formula_raw: Sum Assured = Annual Expenses × Years Remaining

title: Loss Ratio
formula_raw: Loss Ratio = Claims Paid ÷ Premiums Collected

title: Risk Probability
formula_raw: Risk Probability = Event Frequency ÷ Total Events

title: Premium-to-Income Ratio
formula_raw: Premium-to-Income Ratio = Annual Premium ÷ Annual Income × 100

title: Effective Tax Rate
formula_raw: Effective Tax Rate = Tax Paid ÷ Total Income × 100

title: Average Tax Rate
formula_raw: Average Tax Rate = Total Tax ÷ Taxable Income × 100

title: Marginal Tax Rate
formula_raw: Marginal Tax Rate = Tax Rate on Last Income Slab

title: Capital Gains
formula_raw: Capital Gains = Sale Price − Purchase Price − Expenses

title: Tax Savings from Deduction
formula_raw: Tax Savings from Deduction = Deduction × Tax Rate

title: Net Income After Tax
formula_raw: Net Income After Tax = Gross Income − Taxes

title: Gross Rent Multiplier
formula_raw: Gross Rent Multiplier = Property Value ÷ Annual Rent

title: Cap Rate
formula_raw: Cap Rate = Net Operating Income ÷ Property Value × 100

title: Loan-to-Cost Ratio
formula_raw: Loan-to-Cost Ratio = Loan Amount ÷ Project Cost × 100

title: Net Operating Income
formula_raw: Net Operating Income = Rent − Operating Expenses

title: Payback Period
formula_raw: Payback Period = Cost ÷ Annual Cash Inflow

title: Cash-on-Cash Return
formula_raw: Cash-on-Cash Return = Annual Cash Flow ÷ Invested Cash × 100

title: Property Tax
formula_raw: Property Tax = Property Value × Tax Rate

title: Appreciation
formula_raw: Appreciation = (Current Value − Purchase Value) ÷ Purchase Value × 100

title: Real Interest Rate
formula_raw: Real Interest Rate = Nominal Rate − Inflation Rate

title: Purchasing Power Parity
formula_raw: Purchasing Power Parity = Exchange Rate × (Price Index A ÷ Price Index B)

title: Big Mac Index
formula_raw: Big Mac Index = Price in Country A ÷ Price in Country B

title: Effective Exchange Rate
formula_raw: Effective Exchange Rate = Weighted Avg of Currency Rates

title: Disposable Income
formula_raw: Disposable Income = Income − Taxes − Fixed Obligations

title: Savings to GDP Ratio
formula_raw: Savings to GDP Ratio = Savings ÷ GDP × 100

title: Rebalancing %
formula_raw: Rebalancing % = (Current Weight − Target Weight) ÷ Target Weight × 100

title: Diversification Ratio
formula_raw: Diversification Ratio = Portfolio Std Dev ÷ Weighted Avg Std Dev

title: Wealth Growth Rate
formula_raw: Wealth Growth Rate = (End Net Worth − Start Net Worth) ÷ Years

title: Liquid Net Worth
formula_raw: Liquid Net Worth = Liquid Assets − Short-Term Liabilities

title: Debt-to-Asset Ratio
formula_raw: Debt-to-Asset Ratio = Total Debt ÷ Total Assets × 100

title: Financial Independence Number
formula_raw: Financial Independence Number = Annual Expense ÷ Withdrawal Rate

title: Wealth Index
formula_raw: Wealth Index = Net Worth ÷ (Annual Expense × Years)

title: Lean Body Mass
formula_raw: Lean Body Mass = Body Weight − (Body Weight × Body Fat %)

title: Basal Water Requirement
formula_raw: Basal Water Requirement = 30 ml × Body Weight (kg)

title: Calorie Needs
formula_raw: Calorie Needs = Protein Cal + Carb Cal + Fat Cal

title: Sugar Load
formula_raw: Sugar Load = (Grams of Sugar ÷ Total Carbs) × 100

title: Meal Frequency Energy
formula_raw: Meal Frequency Energy = Total Calories ÷ Meals per Day

title: Strength Progression
formula_raw: Strength Progression = New Max = Old Max × (1 + %Increase)

title: Recovery Ratio
formula_raw: Recovery Ratio = Work Interval ÷ Rest Interval

title: Minute Ventilation
formula_raw: Minute Ventilation = Tidal Volume × Respiratory Rate

title: Blood Sugar Index
formula_raw: Blood Sugar Index = Glucose ÷ Normal Range × 100

title: Body Temp Adjusted HR
formula_raw: Body Temp Adjusted HR = HR + (1 bpm per 1°C rise)

title: Creatinine Clearance
formula_raw: Creatinine Clearance = (140 − Age) × Weight ÷ (72 × Serum Creatinine)

title: Tennis First Serve %
formula_raw: Tennis First Serve % = First Serves In ÷ First Serves Attempted

title: Golf Handicap
formula_raw: Golf Handicap = (Score − Course Rating) × 113 ÷ Slope Rating

title: Cycling FTP (Functional Threshold Power)
formula_raw: Cycling FTP (Functional Threshold Power) = Avg Power ÷ 60

title: Lactate Threshold %HRmax
formula_raw: Lactate Threshold %HRmax = HR at LT ÷ HRmax × 100

title: Cardio Risk Score
formula_raw: Cardio Risk Score = (LDL + TG + BP + BMI) ÷ Age

title: Framingham Risk %
formula_raw: Framingham Risk % = Age + Cholesterol + BP + Smoking factors

title: Stroke Risk %
formula_raw: Stroke Risk % = BP × Cholesterol × Diabetes ÷ Age

title: Diabetes Risk
formula_raw: Diabetes Risk = (FPG + BMI + Age + Family History Score) ÷ 4

title: Osteoporosis Risk
formula_raw: Osteoporosis Risk = BMD ÷ Young Adult Mean × 100

title: Sleep Efficiency %
formula_raw: Sleep Efficiency % = (Total Sleep ÷ Time in Bed) × 100

title: Daily Steps Goal
formula_raw: Daily Steps Goal = 10,000 or Activity Factor × Weight

title: Sleep Debt
formula_raw: Sleep Debt = Required Sleep − Actual Sleep

title: Work-Life Balance %
formula_raw: Work-Life Balance % = Personal Hours ÷ Total Hours × 100

title: Resting HR Trend
formula_raw: Resting HR Trend = HR Morning ÷ HR Evening × 100

title: (x + y + z)²
formula_raw: (x + y + z)² = x² + y² + z² + 2(xy + yz + zx)

title: Area of Triangle
formula_raw: Area of Triangle = ½ × b × h

title: Law of Sines
formula_raw: Law of Sines = a/sinA = b/sinB = c/sinC

title: Law of Cosines
formula_raw: Law of Cosines = c² = a²+b²−2ab cosC

title: Area of Triangle (Trig)
formula_raw: Area of Triangle (Trig) = ½ ab sinC

title: Exam Score Improvement %
formula_raw: Exam Score Improvement % = (New Score−Old Score)/Old Score ×100

title: CPU Efficiency
formula_raw: CPU Efficiency = Useful Work ÷ Total Work × 100

title: Algorithm Complexity
formula_raw: Algorithm Complexity = O(n), O(log n), etc.

title: Operating Profit (EBIT)
formula_raw: Operating Profit (EBIT) = Gross Profit − Operating Expenses

title: EPS (Earnings per Share)
formula_raw: EPS (Earnings per Share) = Net Income ÷ Shares Outstanding

title: ROE (Return on Equity)
formula_raw: ROE (Return on Equity) = Net Income ÷ Shareholder Equity × 100

title: ROA (Return on Assets)
formula_raw: ROA (Return on Assets) = Net Income ÷ Total Assets × 100

title: Operating Cash Flow
formula_raw: Operating Cash Flow = Net Income + Non-Cash Expenses − ΔWorking Capital

title: Free Cash Flow
formula_raw: Free Cash Flow = OCF − Capital Expenditures

title: Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC)
formula_raw: Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC) = DIO + DSO − DPO

title: Current Ratio
formula_raw: Current Ratio = Current Assets ÷ Current Liabilities

title: Quick Ratio
formula_raw: Quick Ratio = (Current Assets − Inventory) ÷ Current Liabilities

title: Working Capital
formula_raw: Working Capital = Current Assets − Current Liabilities

title: Liquidity Ratio
formula_raw: Liquidity Ratio = Liquid Assets ÷ Short-term Liabilities

title: Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR)
formula_raw: Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR) = Net Operating Income ÷ Debt Payments

title: Operating Cash Flow Ratio
formula_raw: Operating Cash Flow Ratio = OCF ÷ Current Liabilities

title: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
formula_raw: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) = Sales & Marketing Cost ÷ New Customers

title: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
formula_raw: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) = Avg Value × Gross Margin × Lifespan

title: ROI on Marketing
formula_raw: ROI on Marketing = (Revenue from Campaign − Cost) ÷ Cost × 100

title: Sales Growth %
formula_raw: Sales Growth % = (Current Sales − Past Sales) ÷ Past Sales × 100

title: Market Share %
formula_raw: Market Share % = Company Sales ÷ Industry Sales × 100

title: ARPU (Average Revenue per User)
formula_raw: ARPU (Average Revenue per User) = Revenue ÷ Users

title: Sales per Employee
formula_raw: Sales per Employee = Revenue ÷ Sales Staff

title: Upsell Ratio
formula_raw: Upsell Ratio = Upsell Revenue ÷ Base Revenue × 100

title: Cost per Lead (CPL)
formula_raw: Cost per Lead (CPL) = Marketing Cost ÷ Leads Generated

title: Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)
formula_raw: Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) = Revenue from Ads ÷ Ad Spend

title: Machine Utilization %
formula_raw: Machine Utilization % = Actual Hours ÷ Available Hours × 100

title: OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness)
formula_raw: OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness) = Availability × Performance × Quality

title: Breakeven Point (Units)
formula_raw: Breakeven Point (Units) = Fixed Costs ÷ (Price − Variable Cost)

title: Breakeven Revenue
formula_raw: Breakeven Revenue = Fixed Costs ÷ Contribution Margin Ratio

title: Burn Rate
formula_raw: Burn Rate = Monthly Expenses − Monthly Revenue

title: Valuation (VC Method)
formula_raw: Valuation (VC Method) = Exit Value ÷ ROI Multiple

title: Growth Rate %
formula_raw: Growth Rate % = (New Value − Old Value) ÷ Old Value × 100

title: Enterprise Value (EV)
formula_raw: Enterprise Value (EV) = Market Cap + Debt − Cash

title: Market-to-Book Ratio
formula_raw: Market-to-Book Ratio = Market Value ÷ Book Value

title: Actual Cost (AC)
formula_raw: Actual Cost (AC) = Sum of Actual Expenses

title: Critical Path Duration
formula_raw: Critical Path Duration = Sum of Longest Path Activities

title: Profit per Employee
formula_raw: Profit per Employee = Net Profit ÷ Employees

title: Cost per Hire
formula_raw: Cost per Hire = Recruitment Cost ÷ Hires

title: Break-even Probability
formula_raw: Break-even Probability = Fixed Cost ÷ Contribution Margin

title: Risk-Return Ratio
formula_raw: Risk-Return Ratio = Expected Return ÷ Standard Deviation

title: Default Risk %
formula_raw: Default Risk % = Bad Debts ÷ Total Loans × 100

title: Margin of Safety %
formula_raw: Margin of Safety % = (Sales − Break-even Sales) ÷ Sales × 100

title: GDP Contribution %
formula_raw: GDP Contribution % = Sector GDP ÷ Total GDP × 100

title: Porter’s ROI Index
formula_raw: Porter’s ROI Index = Industry ROI ÷ Firm ROI

title: Viral Coefficient
formula_raw: Viral Coefficient = # of Invites × Conversion Rate

title: Time per Task
formula_raw: Time per Task = Total Time ÷ Tasks Completed

title: Focus Ratio
formula_raw: Focus Ratio = Deep Work Hours ÷ Total Work Hours

title: Task Completion Rate %
formula_raw: Task Completion Rate % = (Completed Tasks ÷ Assigned Tasks) × 100

title: Time Lost to Interruptions %
formula_raw: Time Lost to Interruptions % = (Interrupt Time ÷ Total Time) × 100

title: Deadline Compliance %
formula_raw: Deadline Compliance % = (Tasks on Time ÷ Total Tasks) × 100

title: Defect Density
formula_raw: Defect Density = Defects ÷ Work Units Completed

title: Work in Progress %
formula_raw: Work in Progress % = (Ongoing Tasks ÷ Total Tasks) × 100

title: Output per Employee
formula_raw: Output per Employee = Total Output ÷ Employees

title: Profit per Employee
formula_raw: Profit per Employee = Net Profit ÷ Employees

title: Overtime Hours %
formula_raw: Overtime Hours % = Overtime Hours ÷ Total Hours × 100

title: Skill Utilization %
formula_raw: Skill Utilization % = Skills Used ÷ Total Skills × 100

title: Cycle Time
formula_raw: Cycle Time = End Time − Start Time

title: First Pass Yield %
formula_raw: First Pass Yield % = (Good Units ÷ Total Units) × 100

title: Defect Removal Efficiency %
formula_raw: Defect Removal Efficiency % = (Defects Fixed ÷ Total Defects) × 100

title: Cost Efficiency %
formula_raw: Cost Efficiency % = Planned Cost ÷ Actual Cost × 100

title: Service Level %
formula_raw: Service Level % = On-time Deliveries ÷ Total Deliveries × 100

title: Satisfaction Score %
formula_raw: Satisfaction Score % = Positive Feedback ÷ Total Feedback × 100

title: Focus Time Ratio
formula_raw: Focus Time Ratio = Deep Work Hours ÷ Total Work Hours

title: Task Prioritization Index
formula_raw: Task Prioritization Index = (High Priority ÷ Total Tasks) × 100

title: Time Saved %
formula_raw: Time Saved % = (Old Time − New Time) ÷ Old Time × 100

title: Interruptions %
formula_raw: Interruptions % = Interrupt Time ÷ Total Work Time × 100

title: Email Time %
formula_raw: Email Time % = Email Hours ÷ Total Work Hours × 100

title: Daily Step Goal %
formula_raw: Daily Step Goal % = Steps Taken ÷ Step Goal × 100

title: Screen Time %
formula_raw: Screen Time % = Screen Hours ÷ Work Hours × 100

title: Work-Life Balance %
formula_raw: Work-Life Balance % = Personal Hours ÷ Total Hours × 100

title: Productivity Growth %
formula_raw: Productivity Growth % = (New Output − Old Output) ÷ Old Output × 100

title: Task Distribution Balance
formula_raw: Task Distribution Balance = (Max Load − Min Load) ÷ Avg Load × 100

title: Meeting Effectiveness %
formula_raw: Meeting Effectiveness % = (Action Items Completed ÷ Action Items Assigned) × 100

title: Team Engagement %
formula_raw: Team Engagement % = Active Members ÷ Total Members × 100

title: Conflict Resolution %
formula_raw: Conflict Resolution % = Resolved Issues ÷ Reported Issues × 100

title: Innovation Index
formula_raw: Innovation Index = New Ideas ÷ Total Ideas × 100

title: Team Alignment %
formula_raw: Team Alignment % = Shared Goals ÷ Individual Goals × 100

title: Task Redundancy %
formula_raw: Task Redundancy % = Duplicate Tasks ÷ Total Tasks × 100

title: Communication Effectiveness %
formula_raw: Communication Effectiveness % = Understood Messages ÷ Sent Messages × 100

title: Team Productivity Index
formula_raw: Team Productivity Index = Team Output ÷ Team Hours

title: Meeting Load %
formula_raw: Meeting Load % = Meeting Hours ÷ Team Hours × 100

title: Collaboration ROI %
formula_raw: Collaboration ROI % = (Team Output − Individual Output) ÷ Individual Output × 100

title: Collective Efficiency
formula_raw: Collective Efficiency = Avg Individual Efficiency × Team Synergy

title: Automation ROI %
formula_raw: Automation ROI % = (Time Saved × Cost per Hour − Cost) ÷ Cost × 100

title: Bug Fix Efficiency %
formula_raw: Bug Fix Efficiency % = Bugs Fixed ÷ Bugs Reported × 100

title: Cloud Cost Efficiency %
formula_raw: Cloud Cost Efficiency % = Planned Cost ÷ Actual Cost × 100

title: App Usage %
formula_raw: App Usage % = App Hours ÷ Total Work Hours × 100

title: Digital Collaboration Index
formula_raw: Digital Collaboration Index = Online Tasks ÷ Total Tasks × 100

title: Automation Coverage %
formula_raw: Automation Coverage % = Automated Processes ÷ Total Processes × 100

title: AI Productivity Gain %
formula_raw: AI Productivity Gain % = (AI Output ÷ Human Output) × 100

title: Transformer Ratio
formula_raw: Transformer Ratio = Vp ÷ Vs = Np ÷ Ns

title: Energy of Photon
formula_raw: Energy of Photon = E = hf = hc ÷ λ

title: Binding Energy per Nucleon
formula_raw: Binding Energy per Nucleon = BE ÷ A

title: Mole Fraction
formula_raw: Mole Fraction = Moles of Component ÷ Total Moles

title: Gibbs Free Energy
formula_raw: Gibbs Free Energy = ΔG = ΔH − TΔS

title: Respiration Quotient
formula_raw: Respiration Quotient = CO₂ Produced ÷ O₂ Consumed

title: DNA Base Pair Rule
formula_raw: DNA Base Pair Rule = A=T, G≡C

title: Memory Access Time
formula_raw: Memory Access Time = Hit Ratio×Cache + Miss Ratio×Main

title: Algorithm Complexity
formula_raw: Algorithm Complexity ≈ O(n), O(n log n), etc.

title: Compression Ratio
formula_raw: Compression Ratio = Original Size ÷ Compressed Size

title: Efficiency of Engine
formula_raw: Efficiency of Engine = Output Work ÷ Heat Supplied × 100

title: Safety Factor
formula_raw: Safety Factor = Ultimate Stress ÷ Working Stress

title: Poisson’s Ratio (ν)
formula_raw: Poisson’s Ratio (ν) = Lateral Strain ÷ Longitudinal Strain

title: Bulk Modulus (K)
formula_raw: Bulk Modulus (K) = Volumetric Stress ÷ Volumetric Strain

title: Factor of Safety (FoS)
formula_raw: Factor of Safety (FoS) = Ultimate Stress ÷ Working Stress

title: Bearing Capacity (qult)
formula_raw: Bearing Capacity (qult) = (1.3 × Nc × c) + γDf × Nq + 0.4γBNγ

title: Water-Cement Ratio (w/c)
formula_raw: Water-Cement Ratio (w/c) = Weight of Water ÷ Weight of Cement

title: Concrete Mix Design
formula_raw: Concrete Mix Design = Cement : Sand : Aggregate : Water

title: Slump % Loss
formula_raw: Slump % Loss = (Initial Slump − Final Slump) ÷ Initial Slump × 100

title: Curing Water Requirement
formula_raw: Curing Water Requirement = Surface Area × Water Demand

title: Shrinkage %
formula_raw: Shrinkage % = (Initial Length − Final Length) ÷ Initial Length × 100

title: Truss Force (Method of Joints)
formula_raw: Truss Force (Method of Joints) = ΣFx=0, ΣFy=0

title: Safe Bearing Capacity
formula_raw: Safe Bearing Capacity = Load ÷ Foundation Area

title: PCU (Passenger Car Unit)
formula_raw: PCU (Passenger Car Unit) = Σ(Vehicle Type × PCU Factor)

title: Bitumen Content
formula_raw: Bitumen Content = Weight of Bitumen ÷ Total Mix Weight × 100

title: Bernoulli’s Eq.
formula_raw: Bernoulli’s Eq. = P/ρg + v²/2g + z = constant

title: Indicated Power (IP)
formula_raw: Indicated Power (IP) = (pmi × L × A × n × k) ÷ 60

title: Transformer Ratio
formula_raw: Transformer Ratio = Vp ÷ Vs = Np ÷ Ns

title: Power Factor
formula_raw: Power Factor = Real Power ÷ Apparent Power

title: Labor Productivity
formula_raw: Labor Productivity = Work Done ÷ Labor Hours

title: Equipment Utilization %
formula_raw: Equipment Utilization % = Actual Hours ÷ Available Hours × 100

title: Construction Cost Index
formula_raw: Construction Cost Index = Current Cost ÷ Base Cost × 100

title: Dust Concentration
formula_raw: Dust Concentration = Particles ÷ Volume of Air

title: Average Speed
formula_raw: Average Speed = Total Distance ÷ Total Time

title: Layover Delay %
formula_raw: Layover Delay % = (Layover Time ÷ Total Travel Time) × 100

title: Effective Travel Speed
formula_raw: Effective Travel Speed = Total Distance ÷ (Travel Time + Delay)

title: Round Trip Time
formula_raw: Round Trip Time = Outbound Time + Return Time

title: Journey Breaks %
formula_raw: Journey Breaks % = (Break Time ÷ Total Trip Time) × 100

title: Cost per km
formula_raw: Cost per km = Fuel Cost ÷ Distance

title: Fuel Cost for Trip
formula_raw: Fuel Cost for Trip = Distance × (Fuel Used ÷ Distance) × Fuel Price

title: EV Range
formula_raw: EV Range = Battery Capacity ÷ Consumption Rate

title: Hybrid Efficiency %
formula_raw: Hybrid Efficiency % = EV Miles ÷ Total Miles × 100

title: Idling Fuel Waste
formula_raw: Idling Fuel Waste = Fuel/hr × Idling Hours

title: Carbon Emission (CO₂)
formula_raw: Carbon Emission (CO₂) = Fuel Used × Emission Factor

title: Emission per Passenger
formula_raw: Emission per Passenger = Total Emission ÷ Passengers

title: Payload Fuel Penalty
formula_raw: Payload Fuel Penalty = Extra Fuel ÷ Extra Weight

title: Overtaking Sight Distance (OSD)
formula_raw: Overtaking Sight Distance (OSD) = d₁ + d₂ + d₃

title: Traffic Density
formula_raw: Traffic Density = Vehicles ÷ Length of Road

title: PCU (Passenger Car Unit)
formula_raw: PCU (Passenger Car Unit) = Σ(Vehicles × PCU Factor)

title: Vehicle Utilization %
formula_raw: Vehicle Utilization % = Used Days ÷ Available Days × 100

title: Congestion Index
formula_raw: Congestion Index = Actual Speed ÷ Free Speed × 100

title: Travel Time Index
formula_raw: Travel Time Index = Peak Time ÷ Free Flow Time

title: Track Utilization %
formula_raw: Track Utilization % = Train Hours ÷ Track Hours × 100

title: Turnaround Time
formula_raw: Turnaround Time = Arrival to Next Departure

title: Block Time
formula_raw: Block Time = Gate Out − Gate In

title: On-Time Performance %
formula_raw: On-Time Performance % = On-time Flights ÷ Total Flights × 100

title: Ground Delay %
formula_raw: Ground Delay % = Ground Delay ÷ Total Delay × 100

title: Air Cargo Load Factor
formula_raw: Air Cargo Load Factor = Freight Tonne-km ÷ Available Freight Tonne-km

title: Runway Occupancy Time
formula_raw: Runway Occupancy Time = Time Aircraft Stays on Runway

title: Deadweight Tonnage (DWT)
formula_raw: Deadweight Tonnage (DWT) = Cargo + Fuel + Crew + Provisions

title: Gross Tonnage (GT)
formula_raw: Gross Tonnage (GT) = Volume of All Enclosed Spaces ÷ 100

title: Fuel Consumption per Nautical Mile
formula_raw: Fuel Consumption per Nautical Mile = Fuel ÷ Distance

title: Port Time %
formula_raw: Port Time % = Port Hours ÷ Total Voyage Hours × 100

title: Ship Efficiency Index
formula_raw: Ship Efficiency Index = Cargo Tonnes ÷ Fuel Tonnes

title: Lead Time
formula_raw: Lead Time = Order Time − Delivery Time

title: Cycle Time
formula_raw: Cycle Time = Processing Time + Transport Time

title: Order Accuracy %
formula_raw: Order Accuracy % = Correct Orders ÷ Total Orders × 100

title: Freight Cost per km
formula_raw: Freight Cost per km = Freight Cost ÷ Distance

title: Freight Cost per Tonne
formula_raw: Freight Cost per Tonne = Freight Cost ÷ Tonnage

title: Load Factor %
formula_raw: Load Factor % = Actual Load ÷ Vehicle Capacity × 100

title: Utilization Rate %
formula_raw: Utilization Rate % = Time in Use ÷ Total Time × 100

title: Empty Run %
formula_raw: Empty Run % = Empty Distance ÷ Total Distance × 100

title: Supply Chain Cycle Efficiency (SCCE)
formula_raw: Supply Chain Cycle Efficiency (SCCE) = Value-added Time ÷ Total Time

title: Dock Utilization %
formula_raw: Dock Utilization % = Dock Time ÷ Total Time × 100

title: Damage Ratio %
formula_raw: Damage Ratio % = Damaged Goods ÷ Total Goods × 100

formula_raw: Great Circle Distance = R × cos⁻¹(sinφ₁sinφ₂ + cosφ₁cosφ₂cosΔλ)

title: Rhumb Line Distance
formula_raw: Rhumb Line Distance = ΔLat ÷ cos(Mean Lat)

title: Fuel per Leg
formula_raw: Fuel per Leg = Fuel/hr × Hours per Leg

title: Navigation Drift %
formula_raw: Navigation Drift % = Actual Path ÷ Planned Path × 100

title: Mapping Scale
formula_raw: Mapping Scale = Map Distance ÷ Ground Distance

title: Cost per Day Living
formula_raw: Cost per Day Living = Monthly Expense ÷ 30

title: Household Productivity Index
formula_raw: Household Productivity Index = Tasks Completed ÷ Planned Tasks

title: Debt Repayment %
formula_raw: Debt Repayment % = Paid Debt ÷ Total Debt × 100

title: Cost per Appliance
formula_raw: Cost per Appliance = Appliance kWh × Rate

title: Water Usage per Person
formula_raw: Water Usage per Person = Total Liters ÷ Members

title: Solar Power Generated
formula_raw: Solar Power Generated = Area × Efficiency × Sunlight hrs × 1000

title: Battery Backup Time
formula_raw: Battery Backup Time = Battery Capacity ÷ Load Power

title: Appliance Load Factor %
formula_raw: Appliance Load Factor % = Avg Load ÷ Max Load × 100

title: Protein Ratio %
formula_raw: Protein Ratio % = Protein Cal ÷ Total Cal × 100

title: Sugar Ratio %
formula_raw: Sugar Ratio % = Sugar g ÷ Total g × 100

formula_raw: Cooking Time Adjustment = Old Time × (New Temp ÷ Old Temp)

title: Cost per Meal
formula_raw: Cost per Meal = Total Ingredients ÷ Servings

formula_raw: Salt per Person = 5 g/day ÷ Household Members

title: Cooking Energy Cost
formula_raw: Cooking Energy Cost = Appliance Power × Time × Tariff

title: Meal Frequency %
formula_raw: Meal Frequency % = Meals Taken ÷ Meals Planned × 100

formula_raw: Food Inflation % = (New Price − Old Price) ÷ Old Price × 100

formula_raw: Storage Loss % = Lost Quantity ÷ Stored Quantity × 100

title: Daily Water Need
formula_raw: Daily Water Need = 30 ml × Body Weight (kg)

title: Calorie Burn (House Chores)

title: Sleep Efficiency %
formula_raw: Sleep Efficiency % = Sleep Hours ÷ Time in Bed × 100

title: Stress Index %
formula_raw: Stress Index % = Stress Hours ÷ Work Hours × 100

title: Household Health Index
formula_raw: Household Health Index = (Healthy Days ÷ Total Days) × 100

title: Sick Leave %
formula_raw: Sick Leave % = Sick Days ÷ Total Days × 100

title: Screen Time %
formula_raw: Screen Time % = Screen Hours ÷ Day Hours × 100

title: Paint Needed
formula_raw: Paint Needed = Area ÷ Coverage per Liter

title: Tile Count
formula_raw: Tile Count = Floor Area ÷ Tile Area

title: Maintenance Cost %
formula_raw: Maintenance Cost % = Repair Cost ÷ Asset Value × 100

title: Appliance Life Expectancy %
formula_raw: Appliance Life Expectancy % = Used Life ÷ Expected Life × 100

title: Household Energy Index
formula_raw: Household Energy Index = Energy Use ÷ Household Size

title: Work-Life Balance %
formula_raw: Work-Life Balance % = Personal Hours ÷ Total Hours × 100

title: Leisure Time %
formula_raw: Leisure Time % = Leisure Hours ÷ Day Hours × 100

title: Hobby Time %
formula_raw: Hobby Time % = Hobby Hours ÷ Free Hours × 100

title: Household Happiness Index
formula_raw: Household Happiness Index = (Positive Days ÷ Total Days) × 100

title: Daily Step Goal %
formula_raw: Daily Step Goal % = Steps Taken ÷ Goal × 100

title: Sleep Debt
formula_raw: Sleep Debt = Required Sleep − Actual Sleep

title: Family Time %
formula_raw: Family Time % = Family Hours ÷ Day Hours × 100

title: Laundry Load
formula_raw: Laundry Load = Weight of Clothes ÷ Machine Capacity

title: Detergent Dosage
formula_raw: Detergent Dosage = Clothes Weight × Detergent Ratio

title: Cleaning Efficiency %
formula_raw: Cleaning Efficiency % = Dirt Removed ÷ Dirt Present × 100

title: Soap Cost per Wash
formula_raw: Soap Cost per Wash = Soap Volume × Cost per ml

title: Waste Segregation %
formula_raw: Waste Segregation % = Sorted Waste ÷ Total Waste × 100

title: Household Hygiene Score
formula_raw: Household Hygiene Score = Cleanliness Tasks Done ÷ Planned × 100

title: Odor Control %
formula_raw: Odor Control % = Fresh Days ÷ Total Days × 100

title: Pest Index %
formula_raw: Pest Index % = Pest-free Days ÷ Total Days × 100

title: Garden Coverage %
formula_raw: Garden Coverage % = Garden Area ÷ Plot Area × 100

title: Sunlight Hours %
formula_raw: Sunlight Hours % = Sunlight Hours ÷ Day Hours × 100

title: Water Efficiency %
formula_raw: Water Efficiency % = Water Used ÷ Water Required × 100

title: Property Value (Income Approach)
formula_raw: Property Value (Income Approach) = Net Operating Income ÷ Cap Rate

title: Property Value (Sales Comparison)
formula_raw: Property Value (Sales Comparison) = Comparable Price × Adjustment Factor

title: Gross Rent Multiplier (GRM)
formula_raw: Gross Rent Multiplier (GRM) = Property Price ÷ Annual Rent

title: Capitalization Rate (Cap Rate)
formula_raw: Capitalization Rate (Cap Rate) = NOI ÷ Property Value × 100

title: Price per Square Foot
formula_raw: Price per Square Foot = Property Price ÷ Area (sqft)

title: Land Value
formula_raw: Land Value = Comparable Land Price ÷ Land Area

title: Replacement Cost
formula_raw: Replacement Cost = Cost per Sqft × Built-up Area

title: Remaining Economic Life
formula_raw: Remaining Economic Life = Total Life − Effective Age

title: Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR)
formula_raw: Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR) = NOI ÷ Debt Payments

title: Outstanding Loan Balance
formula_raw: Outstanding Loan Balance = EMI × Remaining Months

title: Amortization (nth Payment Interest)
formula_raw: Amortization (nth Payment Interest) = Remaining Principal × r ÷ 12

title: Balloon Payment
formula_raw: Balloon Payment = Loan Principal − Paid Installments × EMI

title: Mortgage Constant
formula_raw: Mortgage Constant = Annual Debt Service ÷ Loan Principal

title: Housing Expense Ratio
formula_raw: Housing Expense Ratio = PITI ÷ Gross Income × 100

title: Gross Debt Service Ratio (GDS)
formula_raw: Gross Debt Service Ratio (GDS) = (Housing Costs ÷ Income) × 100

title: Total Debt Service Ratio (TDS)
formula_raw: Total Debt Service Ratio (TDS) = (All Debts ÷ Income) × 100

title: Net Rental Yield %
formula_raw: Net Rental Yield % = (Rent − Expenses) ÷ Property Value × 100

title: Rent-to-Value Ratio
formula_raw: Rent-to-Value Ratio = Monthly Rent ÷ Property Value × 100

title: Vacancy Rate %
formula_raw: Vacancy Rate % = Vacant Units ÷ Total Units × 100

title: Effective Gross Income (EGI)
formula_raw: Effective Gross Income (EGI) = Potential Rent − Vacancy Losses

title: Net Operating Income (NOI)
formula_raw: Net Operating Income (NOI) = EGI − Operating Expenses

title: Cash Flow Before Tax (CFBT)
formula_raw: Cash Flow Before Tax (CFBT) = NOI − Debt Service

title: Cash Flow After Tax (CFAT)
formula_raw: Cash Flow After Tax (CFAT) = CFBT − Taxes

title: Payback Period
formula_raw: Payback Period = Investment ÷ Annual Net Cash Flow

title: Rent Escalation %
formula_raw: Rent Escalation % = (New Rent − Old Rent) ÷ Old Rent × 100

title: Internal Rate of Return (IRR)
formula_raw: Internal Rate of Return (IRR) = r where NPV=0

title: NPV (Net Present Value)
formula_raw: NPV (Net Present Value) = Σ(CFt ÷ (1+r)^t) − Initial Cost

title: Discounted Payback Period
formula_raw: Discounted Payback Period = Years until NPV ≥ 0

title: Profitability Index (PI)
formula_raw: Profitability Index (PI) = PV of Cash Inflows ÷ PV of Outflows

title: Equity Multiple
formula_raw: Equity Multiple = Total Returns ÷ Equity Invested

title: IRR Spread
formula_raw: IRR Spread = Project IRR − Cost of Capital

title: Investment Multiplier
formula_raw: Investment Multiplier = Total Returns ÷ Initial Cost

title: Yield on Cost (YoC)
formula_raw: Yield on Cost (YoC) = NOI ÷ Project Cost × 100

title: Construction Cost
formula_raw: Construction Cost = Area × Cost per Sqft

title: Built-up Area
formula_raw: Built-up Area = Carpet Area × Loading Factor

title: Floor Area Ratio (FAR)
formula_raw: Floor Area Ratio (FAR) = Total Built-up ÷ Plot Area

title: FSI (Floor Space Index)
formula_raw: FSI (Floor Space Index) = Built-up ÷ Land Area

title: Plinth Area
formula_raw: Plinth Area = External Building Area at Ground Floor

title: Super Built-up Area
formula_raw: Super Built-up Area = Carpet Area + Common Area Share

title: Cost per Sqft
formula_raw: Cost per Sqft = Total Cost ÷ Area

title: Material Cost %
formula_raw: Material Cost % = Material Cost ÷ Project Cost × 100

title: Property Tax
formula_raw: Property Tax = Annual Rental Value × Tax Rate

title: Capital Gains Tax
formula_raw: Capital Gains Tax = (Sale − Cost − Improvements) × Rate

title: Wealth Tax
formula_raw: Wealth Tax = Net Property Value × Rate

title: After-Tax Cash Flow
formula_raw: After-Tax Cash Flow = CFAT = CFBT − Taxes

title: Absorption Rate %
formula_raw: Absorption Rate % = Sold Units ÷ Available Units × 100

title: Housing Affordability Index
formula_raw: Housing Affordability Index = (Median Income ÷ Qualifying Income) × 100

title: Price-to-Rent Ratio
formula_raw: Price-to-Rent Ratio = Property Price ÷ Annual Rent

title: Price-to-Income Ratio
formula_raw: Price-to-Income Ratio = Median House Price ÷ Median Household Income

title: Market Value Index
formula_raw: Market Value Index = Current Price ÷ Base Price × 100

title: Property Inflation %
formula_raw: Property Inflation % = (New Price − Old Price) ÷ Old Price × 100

title: GDP Contribution %
formula_raw: GDP Contribution % = Real Estate GDP ÷ National GDP × 100

title: Sharpe Ratio
formula_raw: Sharpe Ratio = (Portfolio Return − Risk-free) ÷ Std Dev

title: Diversification Ratio
formula_raw: Diversification Ratio = Portfolio Std Dev ÷ Weighted Avg Std Dev

title: Portfolio Exposure %
formula_raw: Portfolio Exposure % = Sector Value ÷ Portfolio Value × 100

title: Margin of Safety %
formula_raw: Margin of Safety % = (Intrinsic Value − Market Value) ÷ Intrinsic Value × 100

title: Tenant Turnover Rate %
formula_raw: Tenant Turnover Rate % = Tenants Left ÷ Total Tenants × 100

title: Lease Renewal Rate %
formula_raw: Lease Renewal Rate % = Renewals ÷ Expiring Leases × 100

title: Crop Yield
formula_raw: Crop Yield = Harvested Output ÷ Cultivated Area

title: Yield per Hectare
formula_raw: Yield per Hectare = Total Yield ÷ Area (ha)

title: Seed Replacement Rate %
formula_raw: Seed Replacement Rate % = Certified Seed ÷ Total Seed × 100

title: Crop Intensity %
formula_raw: Crop Intensity % = (Gross Cropped Area ÷ Net Sown Area) × 100

title: Multiple Cropping Index %
formula_raw: Multiple Cropping Index % = (Total Cropped Area ÷ Net Area) × 100

title: Yield Gap %
formula_raw: Yield Gap % = (Potential Yield − Actual Yield) ÷ Potential Yield × 100

title: Gross Yield Value
formula_raw: Gross Yield Value = Yield × Market Price

title: Net Yield Value
formula_raw: Net Yield Value = Gross Yield − Cost of Cultivation

title: Soil Bulk Density
formula_raw: Soil Bulk Density = Mass of Soil ÷ Volume

title: Soil Moisture Content %
formula_raw: Soil Moisture Content % = (Wet Soil − Dry Soil) ÷ Dry Soil × 100

title: Wilting Point %
formula_raw: Wilting Point % = (Water Content at Wilting ÷ Volume) × 100

title: Available Water %
formula_raw: Available Water % = Field Capacity − Wilting Point

title: Cation Exchange Capacity (CEC)
formula_raw: Cation Exchange Capacity (CEC) = Total Cations ÷ Soil Mass

title: Soil Organic Carbon %
formula_raw: Soil Organic Carbon % = Carbon ÷ Soil Weight × 100

title: Water Use Efficiency (WUE)
formula_raw: Water Use Efficiency (WUE) = Yield ÷ Water Used

title: Irrigation Interval
formula_raw: Irrigation Interval = Available Moisture ÷ Daily ET

title: Effective Rainfall
formula_raw: Effective Rainfall = Total Rainfall − Runoff − Losses

title: Fertilizer Requirement (kg)
formula_raw: Fertilizer Requirement (kg) = Nutrient Required ÷ % Nutrient in Fertilizer × 100

title: Nitrogen Use Efficiency
formula_raw: Nitrogen Use Efficiency = Yield ÷ N Applied

title: Phosphorus Use Efficiency
formula_raw: Phosphorus Use Efficiency = Yield ÷ P Applied

title: Potassium Use Efficiency
formula_raw: Potassium Use Efficiency = Yield ÷ K Applied

title: Nutrient Balance
formula_raw: Nutrient Balance = Nutrient Added − Nutrient Removed

title: Fertilizer Cost per ha
formula_raw: Fertilizer Cost per ha = Quantity × Price

title: Lime Requirement
formula_raw: Lime Requirement = (Desired pH − Current pH) × Buffer Factor

title: Fertilizer Efficiency %
formula_raw: Fertilizer Efficiency % = Yield Increase ÷ Fertilizer Used × 100

title: Soil Amendment Rate
formula_raw: Soil Amendment Rate = Required Dose ÷ Application Area

title: Organic Manure Requirement
formula_raw: Organic Manure Requirement = Nutrient Need ÷ Nutrient in Manure

title: Fertilizer Savings %
formula_raw: Fertilizer Savings % = (Old Dose − New Dose) ÷ Old Dose × 100

title: Feed Conversion Ratio (FCR)
formula_raw: Feed Conversion Ratio (FCR) = Feed Intake ÷ Weight Gain

title: Daily Feed Requirement
formula_raw: Daily Feed Requirement = % Body Weight × Weight

title: Milk Yield Efficiency %
formula_raw: Milk Yield Efficiency % = Milk Yield ÷ Feed Intake × 100

title: Livestock Productivity Index
formula_raw: Livestock Productivity Index = Output ÷ Animal Units

title: Lactation Yield
formula_raw: Lactation Yield = Daily Milk × Lactation Days

title: Draft Force
formula_raw: Draft Force = Soil Resistance × Area of Implement

title: Specific Fuel Consumption
formula_raw: Specific Fuel Consumption = Fuel ÷ Power Output

title: Labor Efficiency %
formula_raw: Labor Efficiency % = Actual Work ÷ Standard Work × 100

title: Cost per ha
formula_raw: Cost per ha = Operating Cost ÷ Area

title: Machine Utilization %
formula_raw: Machine Utilization % = Working Time ÷ Available Time × 100

title: Net Return
formula_raw: Net Return = Gross Return − Cost of Cultivation

title: Farm Business Income
formula_raw: Farm Business Income = Gross Income − Operational Costs

title: Net Farm Income
formula_raw: Net Farm Income = Gross Income − (All Costs)

title: Family Labor Income
formula_raw: Family Labor Income = Net Farm Income − Hired Labor

title: Return on Investment (ROI)
formula_raw: Return on Investment (ROI) = Net Return ÷ Cost × 100

title: Shelf Life Index
formula_raw: Shelf Life Index = Safe Days ÷ Expected Days × 100

title: Sustainable Yield Index (SYI)
formula_raw: Sustainable Yield Index (SYI) = (Mean Yield − SD) ÷ Max Yield

title: Soil Health Index
formula_raw: Soil Health Index = (pH + Organic Carbon + Nutrients)/3

title: Mixing Ratio
formula_raw: Mixing Ratio = Water Vapor ÷ Dry Air Mass

title: Relative Humidity %
formula_raw: Relative Humidity % = (Actual Vapor Pressure ÷ Saturation Vapor Pressure) × 100

title: Carbon Offset
formula_raw: Carbon Offset = Emissions Reduced − Emissions Produced

title: Per Capita Emission
formula_raw: Per Capita Emission = Total Emission ÷ Population

title: Carbon Tax Cost
formula_raw: Carbon Tax Cost = Emissions × Tax Rate

title: Carbon Credit Value
formula_raw: Carbon Credit Value = Credits × Market Price

title: Water Quality Index (WQI)
formula_raw: Water Quality Index (WQI) = Σ(Qi × Wi) ÷ ΣWi

title: Dissolved Oxygen %
formula_raw: Dissolved Oxygen % = Actual DO ÷ Saturation DO × 100

title: BOD (Biological Oxygen Demand)
formula_raw: BOD (Biological Oxygen Demand) = Initial DO − Final DO

title: COD (Chemical Oxygen Demand)
formula_raw: COD (Chemical Oxygen Demand) = Oxygen Used ÷ Volume

title: Safe Water Availability
formula_raw: Safe Water Availability = Total Water − Polluted Water

title: Per Capita Water Use
formula_raw: Per Capita Water Use = Water ÷ Population

title: Water Use Efficiency
formula_raw: Water Use Efficiency = Yield ÷ Water Consumed

title: Snow Water Equivalent (SWE)
formula_raw: Snow Water Equivalent (SWE) = Snow Depth × Density ÷ Water Density

title: Stormwater Runoff
formula_raw: Stormwater Runoff = Rainfall × Catchment × Runoff Coefficient

title: Heat Wave Index
formula_raw: Heat Wave Index = Days > Threshold ÷ Total Days × 100

title: Sea Level Rise Rate
formula_raw: Sea Level Rise Rate = ΔSea Level ÷ Years

title: Urban Heat Island Intensity
formula_raw: Urban Heat Island Intensity = Urban Temp − Rural Temp

title: Solar Panel Power (P)
formula_raw: Solar Panel Power (P) = Area × Irradiance × Efficiency

title: PV Capacity Factor %
formula_raw: PV Capacity Factor % = Actual ÷ Rated Output × 100

formula_raw: Wind Turbine Efficiency % = Actual ÷ Betz Limit × 100

title: Biogas Yield
formula_raw: Biogas Yield = Waste × Gas Yield Factor

title: Energy Payback Ratio
formula_raw: Energy Payback Ratio = Lifetime Output ÷ Energy Invested

title: Levelized Cost of Energy (LCOE)
formula_raw: Levelized Cost of Energy (LCOE) = Cost ÷ Energy Produced

title: Ecological Footprint
formula_raw: Ecological Footprint = Land Needed ÷ Land Available

title: Green Building Index
formula_raw: Green Building Index = Sustainable Materials ÷ Total Materials × 100

title: Energy Star Rating %
formula_raw: Energy Star Rating % = Standard ÷ Actual Energy × 100

title: Sustainable Yield Index (SYI)
formula_raw: Sustainable Yield Index (SYI) = (Mean − SD) ÷ Max Yield

title: Circular Economy Index
formula_raw: Circular Economy Index = Recycled ÷ Total Resources × 100

title: Radiation Dose (mSv)
formula_raw: Radiation Dose (mSv) = Energy Absorbed ÷ Body Mass

title: Heat Stress Index
formula_raw: Heat Stress Index = (T + RH + Work Load) ÷ 3

formula_raw: Shot Accuracy % = Shots on Target ÷ Total Shots × 100

formula_raw: Cross Accuracy % = Successful Crosses ÷ Total Crosses × 100

formula_raw: Work Rate Index = Distance ÷ Possession Time

formula_raw: Field Goal % (FG%) = FG Made ÷ FG Attempted × 100

formula_raw: Rebound Rate % = Rebounds ÷ (Team Rebounds + Opponent Rebounds) × 100

formula_raw: Player Efficiency Rating (PER) = (Player Stats ÷ Team Pace)

formula_raw: Bowling Average = Runs Conceded ÷ Wickets Taken

formula_raw: Fielding Efficiency % = Successful Catches ÷ Total Chances × 100

formula_raw: Dot Ball % = Dot Balls ÷ Total Balls × 100

formula_raw: Win Contribution % = Player Runs ÷ Team Runs × 100

formula_raw: First Serve % = First Serves In ÷ Attempts × 100

formula_raw: Aces per Match = Total Aces ÷ Matches

formula_raw: Service Game Win % = Service Games Won ÷ Service Games Played × 100

formula_raw: Return Game Win % = Return Games Won ÷ Return Games Played × 100

formula_raw: Total Points Won % = Points Won ÷ Points Played × 100

formula_raw: Tiebreak Efficiency % = Tiebreaks Won ÷ Tiebreaks Played × 100

formula_raw: Fatigue Index % = (Best Sprint − Worst Sprint) ÷ Best × 100

title: VO₂ Max (Running)
formula_raw: VO₂ Max (Running) = (15 × Max HR ÷ Rest HR)

title: Recovery Ratio %
formula_raw: Recovery Ratio % = Rest HR ÷ Peak HR × 100

formula_raw: Lactate Threshold % = HR at Threshold ÷ HRmax × 100

formula_raw: Stroke Efficiency Index (SEI) = Velocity × Stroke Length

formula_raw: Turn Efficiency % = Time Saved ÷ Lap Time × 100

title: Kick Efficiency %
formula_raw: Kick Efficiency % = Kick Distance ÷ Total Distance × 100

formula_raw: FTP (Functional Threshold Power) = Avg Power ÷ 60 min

formula_raw: Bowling Score (Ten-pin) = Σ(Pins per Frame + Bonus)

formula_raw: Golf Putting Accuracy % = Putts Made ÷ Attempts × 100

formula_raw: Golf GIR % = Greens in Regulation ÷ Holes × 100

formula_raw: Table Tennis Rally Efficiency % = Points Won ÷ Rallies × 100

formula_raw: Camping Cost per Day = Total Cost ÷ Days

formula_raw: Work-Life Balance % = Personal Hours ÷ Total Hours × 100
